1: אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> חִכְּךָ֣ <sup>2441 </sup> <n>to thy mouth</n> שֹׁפָ֔ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>[Set] the trumpet</n> כַּנֶּ֖שֶׁר <sup>5404 </sup> <n>[He shall come] as an eagle</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>against the house</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> יַ֚עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> עָבְר֣וּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>because they have transgressed</n> בְרִיתִ֔י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>my covenant</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> תּוֹרָתִ֖י <sup>8451 </sup> <n>against my law</n> פָּשָֽׁעוּ׃ <sup>6586 </sup> <n>and trespassed</n>
2: לִ֖י יִזְעָ֑קוּ <sup>2199 </sup> <n>shall cry</n> אֱלֹהַ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto me My God</n> יְֽדַעֲנ֖וּךָ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>we know</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n>
3: זָנַ֥ח <sup>2186 </sup> <n>hath cast off</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[the thing that is] good</n> אוֹיֵ֖ב <sup>341 </sup> <n>the enemy</n> יִרְדְּֽפוֹ׃ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>shall pursue</n>
4: הֵ֤ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>They</n> הִמְלִיכוּ֙ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>They have set up kings</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> מִמֶּ֔נִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>They</n> הֵשִׂ֖ירוּ <sup>8323 </sup> <n>have appointed</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדָ֑עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and I knew</n> כַּסְפָּ֣ם <sup>3701 </sup> <n>[it] not of their silver</n> וּזְהָבָ֗ם <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and their gold</n> עָשׂ֤וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>have they made</n> לָהֶם֙ עֲצַבִּ֔ים <sup>6091 </sup> <n>them idols</n> לְמַ֖עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because of</n> יִכָּרֵֽת׃ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>that they may be cut off</n>
5: זָנַח֙ <sup>2186 </sup> <n>hath cast</n> עֶגְלֵ֣ךְ <sup>5695 </sup> <n>Thy calf</n> שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>O Samaria</n> חָרָ֥ה <sup>2734 </sup> <n>is kindled</n> אַפִּ֖י <sup>639 </sup> <n>[thee] off mine anger</n> בָּ֑ם עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>long</n> מָתַ֕י <sup>4970 </sup> <n>How</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>against them how long [will it be] ere</n> יוּכְל֖וּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>they attain</n> נִקָּיֹֽן׃ <sup>5356 </sup> <n>cleanness</n>
6: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Surely</n> מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>For from Israel</n> וְה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>this</n> חָרָ֣שׁ <sup>2796 </sup> <n>[was] it also the workman</n> עָשָׂ֔הוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>made</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>it therefore it [is] not God</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>this</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Surely</n> שְׁבָבִ֣ים <sup>7616 </sup> <n>shall be broken in pieces</n> יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עֵ֖גֶל <sup>5695 </sup> <n>but the calf</n> שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>8111 </sup> <n>of Samaria</n>
7: כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>the wind</n> יִזְרָ֖עוּ <sup>2232 </sup> <n>For they have sown</n> וְסוּפָ֣תָה <sup>5492 </sup> <n>the whirlwind</n> יִקְצֹ֑רוּ <sup>7114 </sup> <n>and they shall reap</n> קָמָ֣ה <sup>7054 </sup> <n>it hath no stalk</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>has</n> ל֗וֹ צֶ֚מַח <sup>6780 </sup> <n>the bud</n> בְּלִ֣י <sup>1097 </sup> <n>no</n> יַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shall yield</n> קֶּ֔מַח <sup>7058 </sup> <n>no meal</n> אוּלַ֣י <sup>194 </sup> <n>if</n> יַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>so be it yield</n> זָרִ֖ים <sup>2114 </sup> <n>the strangers</n> יִבְלָעֻֽהוּ׃ <sup>1104 </sup> <n>shall swallow it up</n>
8: נִבְלַ֖ע <sup>1104 </sup> <n>is swallowed up</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> עַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>are now</n> הָי֣וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>now shall they be among the Gentiles</n> כִּכְלִ֖י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>as a vessel</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> חֵ֥פֶץ <sup>2656 </sup> <n>wherein [is] no pleasure</n> בּֽוֹ׃
9: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֵ֙מָּה֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> עָל֣וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>For they are gone up</n> אַשּׁ֔וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>to Assyria</n> פֶּ֖רֶא <sup>6501 </sup> <n>a wild ass</n> בּוֹדֵ֣ד <sup>909 </sup> <n>alone</n> ל֑וֹ אֶפְרַ֖יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>by himself Ephraim</n> הִתְנ֥וּ <sup>8566 </sup> <n>hath hired</n> אֲהָבִֽים׃ <sup>158 </sup> <n>lovers</n>
10: גַּ֛ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Even</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>though</n> יִתְנ֥וּ <sup>8566 </sup> <n>Yea though they have hired</n> בַגּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the nations</n> עַתָּ֣ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> אֲקַבְּצֵ֑ם <sup>6908 </sup> <n>now will I gather</n> וַיָּחֵ֣לּוּ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>them and they shall sorrow</n> מְּעָ֔ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>a little</n> מִמַּשָּׂ֖א <sup>4853 </sup> <n>for the burden</n> מֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king</n> שָׂרִֽים׃ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>of princes</n>
11: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Since</n> הִרְבָּ֥ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>hath made many</n> אֶפְרַ֛יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Because Ephraim</n> מִזְבְּחֹ֖ת <sup>4196 </sup> <n>altars</n> לַחֲטֹ֑א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>to sin</n> הָיוּ־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have become</n> ל֥וֹ מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <sup>4196 </sup> <n>altars</n> לַחֲטֹֽא׃ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>shall be unto him to sin</n>
12: [אֶכתֹוב־ כ] (אֶ֨כְתָּב־ <sup>3789 </sup> <n>wrote</n> ל֔וֹ <sup>3789 </sup> <n>I have written</n> ק) [רִבֹּו כ] (רֻבֵּ֖י <sup>7239 </sup> <n>myriad</n> ק) תּֽוֹרָתִ֑י <sup>8451 </sup> <n>of my law</n> כְּמוֹ־ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>as</n> זָ֖ר <sup>2114 </sup> <n>as a strange thing</n> נֶחְשָֽׁבוּ׃ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>[but] they were counted</n>
13: זִבְחֵ֣י <sup>2077 </sup> <n>[for] the sacrifices</n> הַבְהָבַ֗י <sup>1890 </sup> <n>of mine offerings</n> יִזְבְּח֤וּ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>They sacrifice</n> בָשָׂר֙ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>flesh</n> וַיֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and eat</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> רָצָ֑ם <sup>7521 </sup> <n>accepteth</n> עַתָּ֞ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> יִזְכֹּ֤ר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>them not now will he remember</n> עֲוֹנָם֙ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>their iniquity</n> וְיִפְקֹ֣ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and visit</n> חַטֹּאותָ֔ם <sup>2403 </sup> <n>their sins</n> הֵ֖מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> מִצְרַ֥יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>to Egypt</n> יָשֽׁוּבוּ׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>they shall return</n>
14: וַיִּשְׁכַּ֨ח <sup>7911 </sup> <n>hath forgotten</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>For Israel</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֹשֵׂ֗הוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>his Maker</n> וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and buildeth</n> הֵֽיכָל֔וֹת <sup>1964 </sup> <n>temples</n> וִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>and Judah</n> הִרְבָּ֖ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>hath multiplied</n> עָרִ֣ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> בְּצֻר֑וֹת <sup>1219 </sup> <n>fenced</n> וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>but I will send</n> אֵ֣שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>a fire</n> בְּעָרָ֔יו <sup>5892 </sup> <n>upon his cities</n> וְאָכְלָ֖ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>and it shall devour</n> אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>759 </sup> <n>the palaces</n> ס
